author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds basic monitoring classes for  inspection of payloads of the type `SiPixelGainCalibrationOffline` and `SiPixelGainCalibrationForHLT` condition formats.
Testing scripts are provided as well. 
Below is couple of examples:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/79354155-5475e800-7f3c-11ea-9366-0d4b64e1de17.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/79354070-34debf80-7f3c-11ea-9a31-a34b3ac501e4.png)

#### PR validation:
Relies on the existing (augmented) unit tests.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
This is not a backport and no backport is needed.
cc:
@tsusa @tvami
title: SiPixel Payload Inspector: Gain Calibration
